definitions.definition: A subatomic particle corresponding to another particle with the same mass , spin and mean lifetime but with charge , parity , strangeness and other quantum numbers flipped in sign ; a particle that has a reversed world line to another.

main_definition: ( particle physics ) A subatomic particle corresponding to another particle with the same mass , spin and mean lifetime but with charge , parity , strangeness and other quantum numbers flipped in sign ; a particle that has a reversed world line to another.
